programme.title: Life of Cards S1 - "Joe Hachem"
programme.desc: Joe Hachem, Australian poker hero, fights for victory at the Aussie Millions while building a family imperium to give room to the next generation.

programme.title: Strange World S1 - "Alien Sounds"
programme.desc: Mysterious, alien sky sounds terrify Canadian residents, who struggle to locate their source.

programme.title: Strange World S1 - "Birds"
programme.desc: Host Alex heads to Arkansas, USA to investigate a Bird Apocalypse where the bodies of thousands of blackbirds rained down from the sky.

programme.title: Strange World S1 - "Killer Mice"
programme.desc: Alex heads to South Australia to investigate a terrifying rodent infestation.

programme.title: Power & S3 - "Lethwei - Dave le Duc"
programme.desc: Dave Leduc is the undefeated world champion in Lethwei, the most brutal sport in the world. It is fought without gloves, with elbows, headbutts and take downs.

programme.title: Power & S3 - "Boxing - Ruqsana Begum"
programme.desc: Ruqsana Begum is a Muay Tai world champion who wants to become the next world champion in boxing. She’s wants to inspire Muslim women and make a difference.

programme.title: Power & S3 - "MMA - Nick Hein"
programme.desc: Nick Hein is a professional Mixed Martial Artist from Cologne and signed with the UFC. His ultimate goal is to become MMA world champion.

programme.title: Power & S3 - "Extreme Martial Arts – Shaina West"
programme.desc: Shaina West taught herself martial arts by watching Youtube recovering from a motorcycle accident. The videos she posted went viral and ‘The Samurider’ was born.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel: The Renovation Diaries
programme.desc: The owner of Kestrel Beer buys an original 1930’s Riley Kestrel, with the intention of restoring it and then breaking the land-speed record. This documentary follows the events from restoration to record day.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Stripped"
programme.desc: Meet Nigel McNally and the team from Kestrel Beer who has hopes of breaking the land speed record in a restored 1930’a Riley Kestrel 9.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Dyno Test"
programme.desc: The record attempt is only one week away and everything seems to be on track, until the results of a dyno test put a spanner in the works.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Meet the Press"
programme.desc: The official press launch of The Flying Kestrel at legendary racetrack, Santa Pod. The Kestrel team is joined by Victor Riley of Riley Cars, and celebrity Rachel Riley.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 1"
programme.desc: The transformation is complete and it’s time for The Flying Kestrel to be put to the test.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space S4 - "Surviving in Deep Space"
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli looks at how surviving in deep space can become a reality.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space S4 - "Spectacular Space Views"
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli looks at the incredible phenomena of our universe, and our own planet’s turbulent atmosphere.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space S4 - "Legends of Apollo"
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli looks at the accomplishments of Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin, the two astronauts who first landed on the moon.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space S4 - "Space Myths"
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli speaks to two experts who debunk many of the myths about outer space.

programme.title: More Curious? S1 - "Memory, Mining and Soil"
programme.desc: Explore the many knots and when to use them. Take a look at mixed martial arts, find out what a satellite is, and discover more about your memory, mining and soil.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel: Return of the Riley
programme.desc: Can the team behind Kestrel Beer and one of the world’s best drag racing engineers break multiple land speed records in a 1930s Kestrel Riley classic car?

programme.title: Space Greed S1 - "Space & Shelter"
programme.desc: Resources are tight in space. Everything that goes up there has mass and therefore a cost.

programme.title: Space Greed S1 - "World Wide Wifi"
programme.desc: How will “world wide wifi” change the world again?

programme.title: Space Greed S1 - "Strange Space Recipes"
programme.desc: Survival anywhere requires that we adapt to our surroundings but how will humans adapt to survive in space?

programme.title: Science of Sound S1 - "Imagination Soundtrack"
programme.desc: Professional athletes use music to get psyched up for a big game. But why does music have the power to inspire, motivate, and make us cry? Marty Music finds out how music makes us move.

programme.title: Science of Sound S1 - "Live Music Vibes"
programme.desc: It’s easy to love live music. Whether you’re jamming with some friends or you’re lost in the crowd at an amazing show, live music really moves us. But why does it feel so much better than listening to music on the best home stereo?

programme.title: Science of Sound S1 - "Untrained Ears"
programme.desc: It’s no surprise that trained musicians experience music differently than others. Sure, musicians can hear and recognize similar chords or melodies across different songs, but is that all?

programme.title: Science of Sound S1 - "Developing Our Taste in Music"
programme.desc: In the era of music streaming, there are millions of songs at our fingertips. But in a world of near infinite music choices, music discovery and exposure have changed drastically.

programme.title: Breakthrough S1 - "The Great Seaweed Invasion"
programme.desc: A giant mass of floating seaweed is invading popular beaches in the US and Caribbean! At sea, the sargassum belt is a floating ecosystem, but when it hits shore it turns toxic.

programme.title: Breakthrough S1 - "ECHO: The Penguin's Bodyguard"
programme.desc: In Antarctica, ECHO - a state-of-the-art robotic penguin - uses remote sensing technology to monitor these now-endangered penguin colonies.

programme.title: The Re-Inventors S3 - "The Bourne Submarine"
programme.desc: Today we will see if it is possible to make an old-school wooden submarine under water and above all back on the surface.

programme.title: The Re-Inventors S3 - "Water Powered Saw"
programme.desc: A gigantic table saw sounds good, especially if it;s only powered by water.

programme.title: The Re-Inventors S3 - "Wind Wagon"
programme.desc: This could have changed history in the Middle Ages. We will make wind powered war chariot.

programme.title: The Re-Inventors S3 - "Ned Kelly"
programme.desc: See how a 19th Century bulletproof suit of armor holds up to 21st Century firepower.

programme.title: Science of Thrills S1 - "Speed"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell climbs aboard some of the world’s fastest theme park rides and learns what it takes to build them.

programme.title: Science of Thrills S1 - "Falling"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell discovers how our fear of falling is exploited by some of the world’s top theme park rides.

programme.title: Science of Thrills S1 - "Height"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell climbs aboard four spectacular rollercoasters in Europe and America that exploit our fear of heights.

programme.title: Science of Thrills S1 - "Inversion"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell investigates four roller coasters in Europe and America that use inversions, or loops, to create thrilling rides.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S6 - "Terry Nobody"
programme.desc: We're putting the action-packed film Nobody to the test. Booby Traps, Claymores and Riot shields make for an interesting day at the range.

programme.title: TechKnow S1 - "The Science Of Sugar"
programme.desc: Exploring the correlation between sugar intake and heart disease in young adults.

programme.title: TechKnow S1 - "Saving The Reef"
programme.desc: A look at how cross-breeding and manipulating corals to withstand warmer sea temperatures and more acidic condition could save coral reefs.

programme.title: TechKnow S1 - "Capturing Carbon"
programme.desc: A look at the science behind curtailing the dangerous effects of climate change by capturing CO2 and converting it into useable products.

programme.title: TechKnow S1 - "Disabled Life Enhancements"
programme.desc: Techknow looks at innovative solutions for accessibility and assistive technology to help persons with disabilities.

programme.title: Ancient Engineering S2 - "Extreme Buildings"
programme.desc: Throughout history, our ancestors have always strived to go higher, bigger, deeper, further - and this is reflected in the buildings and structures around our globe. But what secrets can these ancient structures reveal?

programme.title: Ancient Engineering S2 - "History's Hidden Marvels"
programme.desc: This episode explores some of history's most ingenious, yet lesser-known engineering solutions.

programme.title: Ancient Engineering S2 - "Ancient Waterways"
programme.desc: The ancient ancestors realized that building structures and machines to harness water to provide transport, power, drainage and irrigation was vital to the success of their civilizations.
